venue.address_1: Rte195 & North Eagleville Road, Storrs, CT
venue.name: Storrs Congregational Church

item.description: Light on Yoga: A retreat with Deborah Bennett, CYI exploring, in depth, aspects of the 8 limbs of Yoga including meditation and spiritual lifestyle. Includes yoga session, a few meditations, discussion with question and answer, and a vegetarian lunch. Free. No experience is necessary.10:30 am to 3 pm. Storrs Congregational Church, N.Eagleville Rd & Rte 195. Registration required: 860 487-3597.
item.how_to_find_us: This will be the only function in the auditorium at that time. Clare and Deb will have name tags.
item.why: Enjoy the inner peace & inspiring joy that one experiences after a spiritual retreat. Learn & practice Jyoti meditation. Experience a full yoga session. No previous experience is necessary. Top it off with delicious vegetarian lunch.
item.name: Light on Yoga: A Meditation/Yoga Retreat
